subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: A dreadful first half by St. John’s sank its N.C.A.A. hopes as the Golden Eagles advanced to play Villanova in the Big East Tournament quarterfinals.
snippet: A dreadful first half by St. John’s sank its N.C.A.A. hopes as the Golden Eagles advanced to play Villanova in the Big East Tournament quarterfinals.
